entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Elbow
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:39 PM CST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Elbow 8:00 PM CST Sunday 15 January 2023
Temperature: -7.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -9.1°C
Wind: NNE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow late this evening and overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and overnight. Fog developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of light snow. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow early in the morning. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning and afternoon. Fog dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle in the evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 15 January 2023
